AdditionalFields.Value: Clinical Research Excluding Trials,Molecular/Cellular Biology and Genetics

Description: The number of clinical trials in intraoperative molecular imaging (IMI) also called fluorescent guided surgery (FGS) have risen exponentially over the past decade as the hardware and molecular targeting strategies improve.  This session will focus on addressing some the key questions in the field today: 1) Explanation of data to support the value of these agents in patients; 2) Effective us of these agents in a range of tumor types (lung, brain, pancreas, head and neck cancer, etc); 3) The panel will also address therapeutic options that can be integrated into intraoperative molecular imaging, future considerations in surgical imaging, and opportunities for improvement.
SearchResultBody: ADT12. Intraoperative Molecular Imaging: New Clinical Insights
Title: Intraoperative Molecular Imaging: New Clinical Insights
